text: Manikya Chempazhukka is a 1995 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Thulasidas, starring Mukesh in the lead role.http://spicyonion.com/title/manikya- chempazhukka-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Mukesh as Ashokan * Sukumari * Jagathy Sreekumar as Lalichan * KPAC Lalitha * Nedumudi Venu * Sainudeen * TR Omana * Beena Antony as Latika * Bobby Kottarakkara * Kanakalatha As Sumitra * Maathu as Sridevi/Rajavalli * Oduvil Unnikrishnan * Ramyasree * Shammi Thilakan * Sivaranjani (actress) as Rajavalli/ Anupama * Vinu Chakravarthy ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Thulasidas
title: Manikya Chempazhukka
